c74object.name: el.channel~
c74object.digest: el.channel~ probes a single location within a signal vector.
c74object.description: utility to probe a specific position within a vector. useful for examining FFT data.

objarg.name: channel
objarg.description: The location inside the buffer to peek. This value must be between 0 to (N-1) inclusive where N is the Signal Vector Size.

method.name: channel
method.description: Set the location inside the buffer to peek. This value must be between 0 to (N-1) inclusive where N is the Signal Vector Size.
